response.original_title: NOTHING TO LOSE | Leadville 100 Mile Course Record
response.overview: For 19 years, the Leadville 100 Mile course record had been considered one of the most legendary (and possibly unbreakable) records in ultrarunning. In 2024, David shocked himself and the running world to beat the record by 16 minutes. The win changed his life and went on to be named Trail and Ultra Performance of the Year.
response.title: NOTHING TO LOSE | Leadville 100 Mile Course Record
